title: Estimation
alt: They could say "the connection is probably lost," but it's more fun to do naive time-averaging to give you hope that if you wait around for 1,163 hours, it will finally finish.
transcript:
[Cueball is in a car, talking on his phone.]
Cueball: I'm just outside town, so I should be there in fifteen minutes.
Cueball: Actually, it's looking more like six days.
Cueball: No, wait, thirty seconds.[Caption below the frame:]
The author of the Windows file copy dialog visits some friends.
